content.question: Dopamine, norepinephrine, and acetylcholine are all

choices.label: hormones excreted by the endocrine glands
drugs used in the therapeutic treatment of memory disorders
neurotransmitters that excite or inhibit a neural signal across a synapse

content.answer: neurotransmitters that excite or inhibit a neural signal across a synapse

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
